summary: LOW COOLENT.  TOOK TO THE DEALER AT 40,000 MILES FOR PROBLEM.  DEALER REPLACED MANIFOLD INTAKE GASKETT.  AT 42,000 VEHICLE HEATED TO LUKE WARM TEMPERATURE.  RETURNED TO DEALER AT 45,000 MILES.  DEALER REPLACED RADIATOR AND THERMOSTAT.  DEALERS EXPLINATION: "THE WEEKEST AREA WAS ORIGINALLY REPLACE WHICH LEAD TO OTHER PROBLEMS DOWN THE LINE"!!!!
